participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, she enjoys the intricacies of storytelling and has a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I believe that a progressive tax system is the most equitable way to distribute wealth in a society, and that the rich should be taxed at a higher rate than the poor. I eat breakfast then go right back to bed. I watch funny movies to cheer myself up. I listen to classical music. I work at home on my computer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nostalgic, he enjoys comfort and simplicity in life and has a love for food and nature.
participant_2.background: I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet. I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway. I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie. I will study computer science. I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.

content.text: Not much, I'm just hanging out. What about you?
I'm working on a project at home.
Oh, cool. What kind of project?
Really? That's awesome. What's it about?
Oh, that sounds interesting. I love mysteries.
Yeah, me too. I've always been a big fan of Agatha Christie.
Me too! She's my favorite author.
I'm glad to meet someone who likes her as much as I do.
Me too! I'm always looking for people to talk about her books with.
Well, I'm sure we'll have plenty of time to talk about them in the future.
